org.cpsolver.studentsct.filter

Interface StudentFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombinedStudentFilter, FreshmanStudentFilter, PriortyStudentFilter, RandomStudentFilter, RealStudentFilter, ReverseStudentFilter, Test.ExtraStudentFilter

    public interface StudentFilter
    Interface for filter students based on academic area classifications, majors, or minors. This interface can be used by StudentSectioningXMLLoader to load only subset of all students, and it is used by Test to combine last-like and real students from two XML files.
    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)
